title: This game has been around for so long yet no real way to deal with AFK
body:
Sure if someone doesn't connect you can remake, but I just had a 23 minute game yesterday where our jungle was gone before 5 minutes. no flaming no rage quitting (I hope) just gone. I am actually sure it was an accident, but the point of the matter is I should have been in my promos if not the loss of this game. I know this doesn't happen often, but it still happens and it is completely  tilting to lose a 4 v 5 because the loss of a team mate. Now I am sure if this person came back within 5-10 minutes we could have won and we hoped he did, but alas he did not. Our only option is to report him which is unfair to him because I am actually sure this was not done on purpose. I have always said and will continue to say that if a team has an AFK for more than 70-75% of the game than that team should not lose LP in a ranked game. This is not a perfect idea but it is a start. lets save some unfair frustration for our fellow summoners here and find a simple solution for AFK in ranked. This game has been around for long enough where this should have a solution already.

Edit 1: Please tell me how this can be abused. I am proposing that on the team with the AFK who has to be AFK for 75% of the game will not lose LP except for the AFK person who will receive a 100% - 250% increase in LP lost for example if you were supposed to lose 20 LP you would now lose 40-70 LP now if you have less that that you would get an automatic demotion if you are in leagues 1-4, if you have less and you are in league 5 it will count as more losses toward getting demoted to the next level (Diamond - Plat, plat - gold, and so on). Now for all of you saying Duos will abuse this ohhhh no they will not. If you are in a duo and one of you AFK's for 75% of the game then you both share the increased LP loss. Now if your duoing and someone who is not in the duo afks you can receive the same benefits from the no LP loss.

I see no way in abusing this system, but it could be fine tuned better that is for sure.

replies.body: This system is for sure asked for in good faith and quite frequently, but having a loss prevention option open to a losing team strongly incentivizes said team to try and take that option instead of trying to pull back the game and win normally. Even if you can't just ask your smurf premade to go afk, you can band together with your teammates into trying to flame the toplaner that gave first blood so hard that he ragequits and then stall the game out to have your loss prevented. Even though this strategy would rarely work, a lot of losing teams would take their chances with it and create a more toxic environment on that team than if this system were not in place.

you completely misunderstand what I am saying. The losing team can surrender, but does not have too. they can play the game out still hoping for a return of the AFK person, but if they lose and that person doesn't return then the AFK person will take a huge hit to LP loss. 100%-200% more loss of LP and since it should not happen often this would be a better deterrent for going AFK.

If it is changed to only that person and people the are partied with lose the LP then it is actually less people that are being unfairly punished.

I do not even think you need to increase the LP loss.  If the whole party still had the LP loss like they already do currently then you couldn't boost people this way.  Also then, people who had something unfortunate with their ISP or other technical issue are not unfairly punished.

Any flaming is reportable, so flaming someone into leaving already has built in consequences.  Not to mention people who are douchy enough to flame people are probably likely to lose anyway just from their crappy attitude (and they probably are going to flame anyway regardless of any change).

Last of all any rank creep that would happen would actually balance out fine as some people would not unfairly lose games, and those that won would still in future games have to prove they belong there.  Lets say someone gets insanely lucky and gets 10 afk games in a row they win illegitimately, and they get ranked too high, they will just lose and drop back down to where they should be.  It happens all the time when people get carried up and then can't handle the heat.

I actually think this could work fine.

Right now if someone AFK/drops after the reset, then it is almost always a loss and the whole team is losing LP.  Does not matter if you are partied or not.  You are losing the LP due to the loss.  So if they made it so that nobody loses LP under AFK instance, unless you are partied with the afk, then at least some people are not being punished.  You cannot remove the party LP loss, otherwise it can be abused.  So it does not solve it for everyone, but it would actually be less punitive than what it is currently doing right now.  And honestly, I have rarely ever had a premade member drop.  It is mostly on solo q.

So those 'innocent' people you are talking about are already losing the LP. So this solvent does not add any punishments that are not already in place.  It just helps some solo q people out who are more likely to have afks anyway.

Whatever the criteria, a game should be valid or invalid.  If wins count but losses don't in certain certain circumstances,  then making that circumstance happen is a real strategy in ranking up.
